title: CTS extended square bold sans
content:
If anyone can help with the name of this font that would be greatly appreciated....

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014911im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/1_4399.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Sunset Magazine logo - custom designed (similar to Mousse Script), Auto {Yves (Stephen)}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014911/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39838 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for a cheap alternative to H&FJ Gotham ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014911/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39821 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Shnickerdoodle

comments.content: Could be a stretched out serpentine sans

If this is from a car logo it is probably custom drawn.  
Alternatives: [FF Signa](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014911/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_signa_ot_extended/?sample_text=CTS&sample_size=74), [Aggie](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014911/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/aggie_normal_ot_std_urw/), [Shimano Square](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014911/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/shimano_square_black/)
